channel.title: Hey, Can someone please help me with My server? (read for detail.) thanks
channel.description:
Hi, Can Someone Help Me with the part were you have to run the files that I have down loaded? Please tell me how to do this I would Like that very much... Note: Please dont Recommend a site that I should go read and Follow the Instructions it doesnt help.
Thank you. Sincerly: me :P

item.title: Hey, Can someone please help me with My server? (read for detail.) thanks
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

In your source file, you should see a .bat file named, run or runserver. Click on it and it will run your server. You have to use a client to connect to, like client.silabsoft.org/client.php.

Read full topic
